item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Amy add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Amy add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Amy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Amy add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Amy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Amy add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Amy add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket
